channel.title: Help Plox?
channel.description: Ok, how to you make a file that will just automatically pop up the server and let me play? Can someone give me the code for a 317? Plox help I've tryed and tryed and Tryed!! BUT NO HOPE!!!

item.title: Help Plox?
item.dc:creator: @spearo spearo
item.description:
@spearo wrote:

I think his problem is solved, but if it isn’t could he by any chance mean a ‘splash’ image? for his client?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Plox?
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

xX CoDeR AJ:

He means a “Play Now” button to use. like you would put on a forums a “donation” button. He wants a button that says: Play Now and as you click it, it links you to webclient. People need to read and actually try and figure shit out.

No, the OP needs to be more literate and help us understand his problem. If he isn’t going to give us an easy explanation, there’s no reason in hell we should give him any feedback.

@op Try renaming the “run.bat” to “PlayNow.bat”. Should work perfectly!

Read full topic

item.title: Help Plox?
item.dc:creator: @xX_CoDeR_AJ xX CoDeR AJ
item.description:

He means a “Play Now” button to use. like you would put on a forums a “donation” button. He wants a button that says: Play Now and as you click it, it links you to webclient. People need to read and actually try and figure shit out.

item.title: Help Plox?
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

Doesn’t every client already have a file that let’s you… run the client? Of course you’ve seen it on other servers, you don’t just open the command prompt and type in the code to open the client every time… C’mon man…

If that’s not what you’re trying to say, you should explain more clearly what you mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Plox?
item.dc:creator: @CloudTechnonix CloudTechnonix
item.description:
@CloudTechnonix wrote:

your not understanding me. how to you make a Playnow.bat thats what im asking? I have seen it on other servers. How do you make it is what im asking?

Read full topic
